content: I'm glad you're taking the time to research the camp thoroughly. By the way, speaking of theater, I just watched a professional production of "Hamlet" at the city's renowned theater company yesterday, and it was incredible! The lead actor's performance was so captivating. Anyway, back to the camp... Can you tell me more about the specific camp you're interested in? What's the focus of the camp, and what kind of activities can I expect?
